title: Hua Kai Zhang Meili
synopsis:
The innocent young girl Zhang Meili, through a series of unexpected events, transfers to Huaxia Global Universe Grand High School. Here, she encounters all sorts of wealthy, handsome, gentle, warm-hearted, domineering CEOs, and her destined prince, but also experiences betrayal. How will the kind-hearted Zhang Meili cope? Meanwhile, her mysterious past is slowly being revealed.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
